platforms.name: Jupyter Notebooks
platforms.description: Open-source web application for creating and sharing documents with live code, visualizations, and computer vision experiments.

platforms.name: Streamlit

platforms.name: Plotly Dash
platforms.description: Web framework for building analytical web applications in Python with interactive visualizations for machine learning and data science.

platforms.name: Vaex
platforms.description: Python library for out-of-core DataFrames enabling visualization, exploration, and analysis of large tabular datasets with billions of rows.

platforms.name: Panel

platforms.name: Tome
